content.text: As a registered and activated user, I want to access the login page so that I can enter my credentials and log in to the platform.
The user should be able to log in.
A user can access the login page through the following methods:
By clicking the "Log-in" button from the landing page.
By typing "login" in the URL, for example, "
On the login page, the user interface shall include fields for "Username" and "Password" within a login form.

fields.summary: Access Login Page to Enter Credentials

content.text: As a user, I want to log into the system with my credentials so that I can access my personal member page.
The user enters their credentials, including a username and password.
The user successfully enters their username and password.
If the entered credentials are valid, the user is redirected to the Personal Home Page (Needs_Design).
For Phase 1 testing purposes, if the credentials are valid, the user is directed to a simple page that confirms the validity of the credentials.
If the entered username or password is incorrect, an error message is displayed. Further requirements will be discussed in
Upon successful login, a token is generated and stored in the user's browser, allowing them to remain logged in for a specified period (10 minutes) without the need to log in again.

fields.summary: User Login and Access Personal Home Page

content.text: As a supervisor, I want to be notified when my supervisees submit a new time-off request, so that I  can review and approve/deny the request.
Supervisor should receive an email notification when supervisee submits a new time-off request.
The email should contain the following:
Subject: New Time-Off Request from {Emp First Name} &   & {Emp Last Name}
{Emp First Name} &   & {Emp Last Name} submitted a new time-off request. Please click the link below to review the request.
3. Clicking the {Link} should bring the supervisor to the detailed view

content.text: As a platform admin, I want access to an "Email Invitation Page" where I can input a prospect user's email address and trigger a new sign-up process.
The platform admin should be able to initiate the sign-up process.
The "Email Invitation Page" can be accessed through the following methods:
By typing "invite" in the URL, for example, "
This page will primarily be used by platform admins, and additional user stories will be defined separately.
There should be no "Sign-up" button or link available throughout the app.
On the "Email Invitation Page," the user interface shall include:
"Invite" button to trigger the sign-up processes
Upon successful, the page shall display the result (success/failed)
Success: Email has been sent to the user

fields.summary: Invite Prospect User via Email - Email Invitation Page

content.text: As an invited prospect user, I want to receive a sign-up email with an activation link, so I can proceed with the next step of the sign-up process.
A platform admin enters an email in the form and submits
Send a sign-up email with a unique activation link (token) if the entered email:
is in the system and token has expired, (send new token), OR
is in the system and token has not expired
If the user clicks the link in the email within 72 hours, they shall be redirected to a new page to complete the next step (as defined in the next user story).
If the user clicks the link after 72 hours, they shall be routed to a page displaying the message "Invitation expired - Please contact your admin" (
If the user fails to click the link within 72 hours, the system shall handle the token accordingly (a story will be added to
: An anonymous user who receives a sign-up email with an activation link from a Platform Admin via Email.

fields.summary: Receive and Act on Sign-up Email

content.text: As an invited prospect user, I want to set up my user profile and create a password during the sign-up process, so I have my own user profile and secure credentials that allow me to log in to the platform.
During sign-up, the user is prompted to provide the following information:
Assume that only US phone numbers are entered
The phone number must be 10 digits
Input box should display (999) 999-9999 format when numbers are entered
The password must contain at least 8 characters.
It must contain at least 1 uppercase letter.
It must contain at least 1 lowercase letter.
It must contain at least one number.
It must contain at least one special character.
The password may not contain more than three identical characters in a row.
The user submits the form to complete the Sign-Up process.
The user can successfully submit the sign-up form with all required fields entered.
The password meets the specified requirements.
The password confirmation is successfully completed.
Upon submission, the user is fully signed up and can log in to the platform using their email address (username) used during the invitation and the password they set during the sign-up process.
The user account information is securely stored in the system.

fields.summary: Set Up User Profile and Password during Sign Up

content.text: As a Platform Admin, I want to redirect an invited prospect user to the Invitation Expired page when the user clicks the sign-up link after 72 hours have elapsed since the token was created, in order to enhance platform security.
The invited prospect user clicks the sign-up link in the email after 72 hours have passed since the token was created (
The user is automatically routed to the "Invitation Expired" page.
The user is successfully redirected to the "Invitation Expired" page, which informs them that the link has expired and instructs them to contact the Client Admin for a new link.
The user should see the following message: The link has expired. Please contact the admin.

fields.summary: Redirect User to Invitation Expired Page

content.text: As a Platform Admin, I want to notify users if their credentials are invalid during log-in and lock it after 5 failed attempts so that I can prevent unauthorized log-in attempts.
The user enters their credentials, including a username and password.
The user successfully enters their username and password.
If the entered username or password is incorrect, an error message is displayed, and the user is prompted to try again up to 5 times.
If the user enters incorrect credentials for 5 times, lock the account and display message: Your account is locked. Please contact the admin.

By clicking the activation link, I should be directed to a designated sign-up page.
I should be able to enter the following information:
Pre-populate value provided by Client Admin
Pre-populate value provided by Client Admin. Blank if none
Pre-populate value provided by Client Admin. Blank if none
After successful sign-up, I should be auto-directed to company branded log-in page.
If failed, I should see an error message: Account Creation Failed.
After completing entering password, I should know whether it got completed successfully or not.
If successful, I should receive confirmation that my employee account has been successfully set up, and I should be able to log in to

content.text: As a client admin, I want to set rules for
for my employees based on their employment duration.
1. In Time-Off Settings, there should be an option to set rules for Default Total PTO Hours.
2. Without any rules, the company Default Total PTO hours is 120 hours.
3. I want to create a new rule with providing only two values: Employment Duration and Total PTO Hours
4. The Default Total PTO Hours calculation should follow the following logic:
a. Only one logic at the moment using LESS THAN.

fields.summary: Set Rules for Default Total PTO Hours based on Employment Duration

content.text: As a client admin, I want to set the fiscal year for company PTO policy.
By default, the fiscal year is 01/01 to 12/31.
In Time-Off Settings page, I should be able to change it to any fiscal year starting date. The ending date should be next year minus one.
The Starting Date of fiscal year is when the Default PTO Total Hours resets for all employees.

content.text: As a platform admin, I want to see the reason for the failure when sending an invite to a prospect user on the "Email Invitation" Page.
During the process of sending an email invitation from the "Email Invitation" Page, if the invitation fails for any reason, the backend system generates a specific failure reason.
The platform admin is informed of the failure and can view the reason for the failure on the "Email Invitation" Page.
The failure reason is clearly displayed to the platform admin, providing information about why the invitation was not successful.
This allows the platform admin to understand and address the issue that caused the invitation to fail.
In this ticket, we will update
on the components that are already delivered
Your invitation is expired. Please contact your admin.
Your email is already activated in the system. Please contact your admin for more info.
Unable to connect to the server.
Oops.. something went wrong. Please contact your admin.
The requested page does not exist.
Unable to connect to the server.
A user with this email already exists
The email or password you entered is incorrect.

fields.summary: Display Failure Reason for Invite and Sign-up Process

content.text: As a client admin, I would like to choose available Time-Off Types for my company and configure whether each type is a PTO or not.
1. I should be able to check/select and un-check/un-select time-off types that will be available for my company.
Yes (If company doesnt want to separate vacation days with personal time, then the company can turn it off).
2. There should be option to declare whether each type is exempted from PTO hours or not.
Example) Jury Duty. If exempted, employee can use Jury Duty without using PTO hours. If not exempted, employee must use PTO hours for the Jury Duty.
3. The selected types (including default ones) should be saved in the system for my company.
4. No custom time off type is allowed at the moment.

fields.summary: Select/Unselect Time-Off Types in Client Admin Module

content.text: As a system admin, I want the system to send a customized email to pre-registered client admins who initiate the sign-up process.

When a system admin initiates the sign-up process by entering their email address and clicking "invite" on the "Email Invitation Page," the system should trigger the process of sending a customized email.
The email should be addressed to the pre-registered client admin and contain the following details:
Congratulations! You are the Client Admin for [ClientName] on HRsolutions.com.
To get started, please use the following link to complete your Admin sign-up process:
Please note that this link is unique to you and should not be shared with others.

If you have any questions or encounter any issues during the sign-up process, please don't hesitate to contact our support team at [Support@HRSolutions.com]. We're here to assist you every step of the way.
. We look forward to supporting your HR needs and helping you streamline your HR management.
: An activation link with a unique token that will allow the client admin to complete their account set-up.
The email should be sent to the pre-registered client admin's provided email address.
The activation link with the unique token should be securely generated and included in the email, allowing the client admin to click the link for account activation.

fields.summary: Send Customized Email to Pre-Registered Client Admin for Account Set-Up

content.text: As a pre-registered client admin, I want to to begin sign-up process by clicking the activation link included in the email that was sent to me.
By clicking the activation link, I should be directed to a designated sign-up page.
I should be able to enter the following information:
Same rule, input mask, validation as
After completing entering data, I should know whether it got completed successfully or not.
If successful, I should receive confirmation that my admin account has been successfully set up, and I should be able to log in to
/{Company name} using my new account credentials.
If failed, I should see an error message: Account Creation Failed.
As a Client Admin after completing the sign-up, I should have permission to access Client Management and Employee Management menu (to be further defined in future story).
If there are any errors or issues during the sign-up process, the system should provide clear error messages and guidance on how to resolve them.

fields.summary: Sign-Up Process by Clicking Email Activation Link as a Pre-Registered Client Admin

content.text: As a client admin, I want to  log in and see the Personal Home Page.
On the HRSolutions.com website, there should be a log-in page.
In the log-in page, I should be able to enter my login credentials, which are my username (email address) and password.
If the entered credentials are valid, I should be granted access to my Personal Home Page.
If the entered credentials are invalid or incorrect, the system should display an error message.

content.text: As a client admin logging in for the first time, I want to see a welcome message that informs me to complete my company settings in the Company Management menu.
Upon successfully logging in as a client admin for the first time, I should be presented with a welcome message in a modal on my Personal Home Page.
The welcome message should include the following text: "Welcome! Please complete your Company Setting in the Company Management menu."
The welcome message should include a clickable button that says Company Setting.
When I click the button, it should lead me to the Client Management page
The system should ensure that this welcome message and button are only displayed during the initial log-in of a client admin and not upon subsequent log-ins.

fields.summary: Display Welcome Message for Initial Log-In of Client Admin

content.text: As a client admin, I want to set the time zone for my company.
Within the Settings  Company menu, there should be a dedicated setting or configuration option that allows me to set the time zone for my company.
By default, set the time zone to Eastern Standard Time.
When selecting/changing the time zone, I should be presented with a list of available
Alaska time, Central time, Eastern time, Hawaii-Aleutian time, Mountain time, Pacific time.
I should be able to select the appropriate time zone that corresponds to my company's location and preferences.
After selecting the time zone, the system should save and apply this setting to my company's account, ensuring that it is accurately reflected throughout the system.
For testing purposes, the saved time zone should be set as companys time zone in the Settings.

If I encounter any issues while setting the time zone or if there are errors in displaying the date and time on my Personal Home Page, the system should handle them gracefully and provide relevant error messages or guidance.

fields.summary: Set Time Zone for Company as a Client Admin

content.text: As a client admin, I want the capability to change the company logo associated with my company's account.
Within the Settings  Company menu, there should be a dedicated setting or configuration option that allows me to change the company logo.
When accessing the logo change setting, I should be provided with the ability to upload a new logo image file from my local device.
The system should support commonly used image file formats (e.g., JPEG, PNG) for logo uploads.
After selecting and uploading the new logo image, the system should securely store and associate it with my company's account, replacing the previous logo.

The new logo should be displayed consistently across the system, including on the Personal Home Page, Login Page, and any other relevant areas where the company logo MAY BE used (defined in future stories).
At the moment, there is no resolution nor size requirements.
The system should handle any errors or issues that may arise during the logo change process and provide relevant error messages or guidance.
The logo change process should be user-friendly and intuitive, allowing me to easily update the company's branding as needed.
The updated logo should be reflected immediately after the change, ensuring that it is visible to all users and consistent with the company's branding guidelines.
For testing, please use the following image: (file to be uploaded)

fields.summary: Change Company Logo as a Client Admin

content.text: As a client admin, I want to add a new employee to the system so that they can access our HR solutions platform.
1. In the Settings   Employee section, there should be an option to "Add New Employee".
2. When adding a new employee, the following values can be entered
3. The system should validate the email address to ensure it is unique and conforms to the required format.
If existing, then the error message should be displayed:
4. Employee Start Date should accept the MM/DD/YYYY format. If format not satisfied, display the following message:
Follow the following date format: MM/DD/YYYY
5. Upon adding the new employee, the system should have record of this employee with user type = employee with correct authorizations
6. HR Manager should be treated as its own role. At the moment, HR Manager has same authorization as client admin. The difference will be defined in later phrase.
7. Upon successful creation, automatically send the account activation email to the users email.
8. The email should contain the followings:
Welcome! Your company admin has invited you to use
. To get started, please use the following link to complete your account activation process:
Please note that this link is unique to you and should not be shared with others.
: An activation link with a unique token that will allow the employee user to complete their account set-up.
9. If there are any issues or errors during the employee addition process, the system should provide relevant error messages or guidance to address them.

content.text: As a client admin, I want to re-send an account activation email to new employee if the employee cant find the activation email or the activation token has expired.
In the Settings   Employee section  Employee list, there should be an option to resend activation email.
The option can be text or icon.
This option should only work to newly added employee user who has not completed the sign up or token has expried.
If employee user completed activation, the option should be unclickable.
Upon clicking the option, three things should happen:
Warning or confirmation message saying You are sending a new activation link. Are you sure?
an account activation email with NEW activation link  should be re-sent to the new employees email address.
the previously sent activation link must be expired.
Upon the successful sending of email, there should be a toast or message that says Activation email sent, so that client admin knows it worked.
The email should contain the followings:
Welcome! Your company admin has invited you to use
. To get started, please use the following link to complete your account activation process:
Please note that this link is unique to you and should not be shared with others.
: An activation link with a unique token that will allow the employee user to complete their account set-up.

content.text: As a client admin, I want to inactivate (disable) an employee user's access to the platform when necessary.
In the Employee detailed view, there should be an option to "Inactivate Employee.
When selecting to inactivate an employee user, I should be prompted to confirm the action.
Upon confirmation, the employee's access to the platform should be disabled, preventing them from logging in and accessing HR solutions.
If inactivated employee tries to log-in, display the following message: Your account is inactivated. Please contact your HR team.
Upon confirmation, the inactivated date and time should be captured in the system.
Inactive employees should be clearly marked in order to distinguish them from active users.

content.text: As a client admin, I want the capability to configure the workdays for my company.
Within the Settings  Company menu, there should be a dedicated setting or configuration option that allows me to set the Company Workdays.
By default, set Mondays through Fridays as workdays.
When configuring the workdays, I should be presented with days (Sundays through Saturdays) and be able to declare which day is the company work day.
After selecting and saving the workdays, the system should save and apply this setting to my company's account, ensuring that it is accurately reflected throughout the system.
For testing purposes, the system should display the selected workdays on the configuration page.

If I encounter any issues while setting the workdays or if there are errors in displaying the selected workdays, the system should handle them gracefully and provide relevant error messages or guidance.
The selected workdays should be securely stored and associated with my company's account, ensuring that it is consistently applied across all system features and functions.

fields.summary: Set Company Workdays as a Client Admin

content.text: As a client admin, I want to confirm my company information after the initial log-in AND subsequent log-ins until confirmation is completed.
I have to confirm this to gain access to ANY page. After confirming company name and work hours per day, the change can be only made via request to system admin.
1. Theres two ways to get to this Company Information confirmation page or modal
a. Clicking confirmation link from initial welcome message
2. I should confirm the following items:
3. If my company name work hours per day needs to be updated, I should be able to change it.
4. In the confirmation page or modal, please display the following message:
a. Please take a moment to review and confirm your company details to initiate HRSolutions.
5. Once I confirm, I cannot change it. I can only change it by requesting it to the system admin.
6. After successful confirmation of the Workhours per Day, I can access other Settings menu.

fields.summary: One-Time Confirmation/Setting of Company Info as a Client Admin

content.text: As a user, I want to access to a dedicated "Time Off" interface.
1. The "Time Off" interface should provide the following functionalities (or pages) and information:
Users sees a summarized overview of their time off balances, including accrued time off, used time off, and available time off.
Users initiates the process of requesting new time off directly from the "Time Off" interface.

Supervisors sees a list of pending time off requests submitted by their supervisees. This section should provide details about each pending request, including the requester's name, requested dates, and the status of the request (e.g., pending approval).

content.text: As a client admin, I want to configure the time off usage options for my company to allow employees to request time off for full days, half days, or by hours based on their preferences and company policies.
In Time-Off Settings, there should be options to configure how time off requests are allowed and handled in terms of duration usage:
: this equals to the companys work hours per day
: this equals to the companys work hours per day divided by 2.
: whole positive number only. Validation: Min 1, Max 120.
2. Client admin can select one or two or all of the above usage options.
a. 1) Only Full Days, 2) Only Half Days, 3) Only By Hours, 4) Full Days and Half Days, 5) Full Days and By Hours, 6) Half Days and By Hours, 7) Full Days and Half Dyas and By Hours.

PTO Hours and Sick Leave Hours
Company Fiscal Year, Employee Start Date
Default Total PTO Hours (by Employment Duration)
Carryover Rules ( if YES, maximum number of hours)

content.text: As a client admin, I want to select the PTO policy.
Leaves are accrued to employee account for every period of service.
Employees can use unlimited number of PTOs.
Fixed number of leaves are given to employees at the beginning.
If client admin selects Accrued policy, there should be an additional option asking for the Period
By default, 2 weeks should be default value, but user can provide other period values in week or month
The saved PTO Policy and Period (if Accrued) should be displayed in Time-Off Settings page.

content.text: As a client admin, I would like to delete the existing department values.
In the Company Settings, there should be an option to delete existing department values.
Is department value being used by at least one employee?
Show a warming message. If client admin clicks Yes, then delete the value.
Show a warning message and ask which department the system should assign the current employees to.
The newly assigned department value must be saved for the employees.
Warning message: Department {xxx} is being used. Proceed to delete?\
Assigning employees to different department: To which department do you want to assign the {department_value} employees to?
For assigning a new department value, the client admin should be able to see all the available department values and be able to select one.

content.text: As a client admin, I want to confirm my companys Time-Off Setting after the Company Info setting
Theres two ways to get to this Time-Off Settings confirmation page or modal
If client admin completed confirming Company Info, but did not complete confirming Time-Off, then the Time-Off confirmation page or modal should appear when client admin log in.
However, the client admin should be able to go back to Company Info and make changes.
Client admin should confirm the following settings:
Company Fiscal Year, Employment Start Date, Calendar Year
Company Fiscal Year (Only if Company Fiscal Year is selected from PTO Balance Start Date)
The end date must be one day before the start date (either put validation or auto-calculate end date when client admin enters start date)
Please display the following options with descriptions
Accrued: Leaves are accrued to employee account for every period of service.
Unlimited: Employees can use unlimited number of PTOs.
Lump-Sum: Fixed number of leaves are given to employees at the beginning.
ONLY AVAILABLE IF PTO Policy = Accrued.
IF PTO Policy = Unlimited or Lump-Sum, gray out and display message Only applicable for Accrued PTO Policy
Only applicable for Accrued PTO Policy
3. Display this message: Please take a moment to review and confirm your companys Time-Off settings to initiate HRSolutions.
4. The system should accurately track required fields for service initiations. The 'initiate service' button should be activated once all required fields are filled.

fields.summary: One-Time Confirmation/Setting of Time-Off Settings as a Client Admin
